Title: Expands the New York opportunity promise scholarship to include all SUNY and CUNY approved programs which award certain associate's degrees
Summary: Expands the New York opportunity promise scholarship to include all SUNY AND CUNY approved programs which award certain associate's degrees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding the New York opportunity promise scholarship to include all state university of New York or city university of New York approved programs which award certain associate's degrees
